item.description:
FDI is expanding! They have just moved into a new 25,000 sq ft. facility in Windham, NH. If you haven't checked out what this exciting company is doing, NOW IS THE TIME!

The services are incredible. The income opportunity is phenomenal. I've been working with this company for almost 3 years. That means it stands the test of time!

I invite you all to come check out the new offices of FDI Corporate and come to this Tuesday's Business Presentation. To get a "look" at what FDI is all about, visit www.FDIOverview.com/FDIRocks . Call me with questions. Then come to our meeting on Tuesday to network with and meet the high calibre of people capitalizing on the phenomenal systems offered by this forward thinking company!

Details:

When: Tuesday, November 4, 2008; 6:30 PM Networking (snacks and coffee provided); 7:30 Meeting

Where: FDI Corporate - 1 Industrial Drive, Windham, NH

Directions: From Rt 93 - Take exit 3, RT-111 E ramp toward NO. SALEM.
Turn onto INDIAN ROCK RD/NH-111.
Turn LEFT onto RANGE RD/NH-111. (at traffic lights at the "T")
Take L at next set of lights which is Lamson St.
Turn RIGHT to on INDUSTRIAL DR.
Last building on the right is the new corporate office.



--
Bernadette Trafton
Marketing Director
Home Office: 603-764-5788
Cell Phone: 603-834-4587
www.BostonAREIA.com
Bernadette@BostonAREIA.com

Earn money working from home today! www.FDI4Life.com
FDI Overview

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Come to the NEW Offices of FDI
